resources.name: KidsOne Hindi
resources.description: KidsOne Hindi is a complete Kids edutainment portal.This portal is serving the content in Hindi Language. Animated rhymes in Hindi will be fun to watch and learn. The channel mingles the education content Rhymes, Stories, Dasavatara, Festivals, Panchatantra and more. so that kids can learn with fun.

resources.name: S For Sex
resources.description: A girl is confused about sex because of lack of awareness about it. The film shows how she is refrained from getting the right information from her own people as everybody regards it as a taboo.

resources.name: Battledogs | Hindi Dub
resources.description: New York City is under the threat of a virus that transforms humans into werewolves with extraordinary strength. An evil general tries to get his hands on it to form an army of powerful soldiers.

resources.name: Katamarayudu (Hindi)
resources.description: Katamarayudu released in 2016 is a Telugu action film Based on Veeram starring Power Star Pawan Kalyan as Katamarayudu. The story revolves around Katamarayudu who uses violence to solve issues is made to wed Avantika by his brothers whose ultimate aim is that he should abandon violence. As he tries to control his brutal traits, his wifes kin face perils.

resources.name: Main Hoon Lucky The Racer
resources.description: Main Hoon Lucky The Racer - Its all about two brothers who do things differently. While one brother follows rules and regulations, the other tries to achieve it in his own way.

resources.name: Aladdin
resources.description: Aladdin is an age-old fantasy tale of a 20-year-old boy and his travails around his family and love. It is an absolute family entertainer show. It has got the fantastical factor of classic tale as well as the nail-biting thriller, heart-warming romance and affecting family equations. Despite being set in a very old legendary talismanic era, all the characters are entertaining, yet relatable which makes the fans correlate with its humor.

resources.name: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
resources.description: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah is a SAB Comedy Show inspired from the famous humorous column Duniya Ne Undha Chashmah written by the eminent Gujarati writer Mr. Tarak Mehta. This show revolves around Gada Family which consists of uneducated Businessman Jethalal Champaklal Gada (Actor Dilip Joshi), Jethalals Wife Daya (Disha Wakani) & their naughty Son Tipendra Gada (Bhavya Gandhi) living in Gokuldham Co-operative Society and covers topical issues which are socially relevant. In case of problem and emergency, Jethalal Gada often rushes to Taarak Mehta to seek his help and guidance as he finds a philosopher in him. Jethalal calls his Father Champaklal Gada (Amit Bhatt) from Village to keep an eye on his mischievous Son Tapu but the opposite happens and Bapuji joins hands with Tapu. This hilarious show will surely tickle your funny bone. Is there a trouble waiting for Jethalal?

resources.name: X.X.X.
resources.description: Keep the doors closed and your headphones on! Gear up for an experience that will change you, for better or worse. You've never seen anything like this, and we doubt that you ever will, again. Watch responsibly

resources.name: CID
resources.description: The first thrilling investigative series on Indian Television, is today one of the most popular shows on Sony Entertainment Television. Dramatic and absolutely unpredictable, C.I.D. has captivated viewers over the last eleven years and continues to keep audiences glued to their television sets with its thrilling plots and excitement. Also interwoven in its fast paced plots are the personal challenges that the C.I.D. team faces with non-stop adventure, tremendous pressure and risk, all in the name of duty. The series consists of hard-core police procedural stories dealing with investigation, detection and suspense. The protagonists of the serial are an elite group of police officers belonging to the Crime Investigation Department of the police force, led by ACP Pradyuman [played by the dynamic Shivaji Satam]. While the stories are plausible, there is an emphasis on dramatic plotting and technical complexities faced by the police. At every stage, the plot throws up intriguing twists and turns keeping the officers on the move as they track criminals, led by the smallest of clues.n

resources.name: Guru Randhawa
resources.description: Indian singer and songwriter from Punjab

resources.name: Badshah
resources.description: Aditya Prateek Singh Sisodia, better known by his stage name Badshah, is an Indian rapper and music composer known for his Hindi, Haryanvi, and Punjabi songs.
